Agmazar the Star Titan.name: Agmazar the Star Titan
Agmazar the Star Titan.publicNotes: You briefly conjure a kaiju, a massive, rampaging monster with a unique name and legendary reputation. It rises from its secluded lair to annihilate your foes. The summoned kaiju occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature.

Deific Herald (Chaotic Evil).name: Deific Herald (Chaotic Evil)
Deific Herald (Chaotic Evil).publicNotes: Your faith is strong enough to briefly summon a direct representative of your deity, such as the deity's herald. The herald occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet. The effects of this spell depend on your deity's alignment.

Ebeshra, the Winged Razor.name: Ebeshra, the Winged Razor
Ebeshra, the Winged Razor.publicNotes: You briefly conjure a kaiju, a massive, rampaging monster with a unique name and legendary reputation. It rises from its secluded lair to annihilate your foes. The summoned kaiju occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature.

Elemental Herald (Air).name: Elemental Herald (Air)
Elemental Herald (Air).publicNotes: Your meditation into the different elemental planes connects you to them deeply, and this connection allows you to summon a herald of an elemental lord. The herald arrives in the form of a natural disaster centralized on your enemies. The herald occupies the space of a Huge creature. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the elemental heralds below to summon; if you're a divine spellcaster who worships an elemental lord, you must choose the option matching your deity's element. This spell gains the trait (air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood) matching your choice.

Healing Servitor.name: Healing Servitor
Healing Servitor.publicNotes: You call forth a servitor forged from raw vitality energy to heal and bolster your allies.

Tempest of Shades.name: Tempest of Shades
Tempest of Shades.publicNotes: You channel the forces of undeath to briefly call forth an amalgam of the vengeful dead slain by your enemies and allies alike. This amalgam manifests as a large tornado of insubstantial, howling faces.

The Fluxwraith.name: The Fluxwraith
The Fluxwraith.publicNotes: You break a mirror and cast the shards into the air. Between their thousand fractured reflections, the fluxwraith appearsâ€”a thing of broken glass, broken time and broken lives.
